summary: this is a better ENB preset 2016 .
descriptionHtml:
[i]installation :
[/i][i]1- Select files " in folder " folder , copy and paste them in the game directory
2- Download the last enb series files, extract; select and copy  "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" and paste in game floder.
[/i][i]3 - Install with your favorite manager two .rar files are in the folder named "install with manager "[/i][i]
[/i][i]4 - Enjoy


Okay. This is a slightly complicated process.
Step 1: Go to http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html and download the applicable version of the enb binary files. Open up the folder "wrapperversion" and drop the contents of that into your main Skyrim folder. Most mods are installed in the data folder, but enb files are dropped directly into the main Skyrim folder.
Step 2: Download your favorite enb preset. You can find tons of these on the Nexus. They range from dark and moody to hyperrealistic to oversaturated and beautiful. 
Step 3: For this preset, take the contents of the "in game folder" folder and drop them into your main game folder, overwriting when prompted. Ignore the "my pics" folder. Those are screenshots of the mod in action.
Step 4: This preset includes two conventional mods in the "this install with manager" folder. Install them with Mod Organizer or with Nexus Mod Manager (whichever you prefer. NMM is easier, but MO is much better otherwise.)
Step 5: There are a whole host of changes you have to make to your ini files for enb to function properly. If you don't make these changes, the game will appear extremely buggy. Make sure to turn off antialiasing of any kind in the game's launcher, and follow the instructions in the readme for the enb files.

[/i]Thanks [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4916384]lued1[/url]23
author: Other
